display_long_description:
🌥️  Soar through the skies like never before and restore balance to the universe with Sky Climb! 💫 

This first-person adventure brings classic platforming to VR, featuring an intuitive arm-based locomotion mechanism that allows you to fling yourself from one cube to another in low gravity.

# 🟪 SINGLE PLAYER CAMPAIGN
An adventure with 8 unique worlds, comprising 74 levels complete with boss encounters and power-ups.

[media]

# 🟪 MULTIPLAYER  CHAMPIONSHIP
Challenge your friends in the Online mode, supporting up to 6 players and 24 bots in races, hoop-collecting or shooting challenges.

[media]

# 🟪 PERSONALIZE YOUR CLIMBER
Collect tons of customization options and stand out from the crowd!

[media]

# 🟪 BUILDER MODE
Unleash your creativity and design your very own levels. Dive into a world of endless challenges and share your creations with fellow players, putting your platforming skills to the ultimate test.

[media]

🌟  Key Features:
- 74 single-player levels (including 7 bosses)
- Innovative locomotion system
- Online multiplayer championship
- Customize your hero (colors, shapes, and faces)
- Compete for the title of the fastest climber on the leaderboards for each level
- Level Editor available in Mixed Reality
